block.p: SCOTT-FranK, 80. Of West Orange, N.J., June 28, 1998. Beloved husband of Bette (nee Shapiro). Loving father of John Scott and Stacey Scott Fishman. Brother of Mrs. Sylvia Peris and Mrs. Phyllis Shapiro. Survived by 4 grandchildren. Funeral from the Bernheim Apter Goldsticker Funeral Home, 1600 Springfield Avenue, Maplewood, N.J. on Tuesday, June 30, at 2 PM. Interment in King Solomon Cemetery, Clifton, New Jersey.
